mapper.select: /* Main.xml -> selectMainNotice */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) ROWNUM, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TP, TITLE, FROMDATE, TODATE, REG_ID, CNT, 'N' AS NEW_YN FROM BC_NOTICE )A WHERE ROWNUM < 7

/* Main.xml -> selectSalesOrderStatus */ SELECT CASE WHEN #{LANG} = 'DE' THEN COMM.CODE_NM ELSE COMM.CODE_EN END AS STATUS_NM , ISNULL(ORD.PRE_COUNT, '') AS PRE_COUNT , ISNULL(ORD.PRE_VOL_QTY, '') AS PRE_VOL_QTY , ISNULL(ORD.PRE_T_WT, '') AS PRE_T_WT , ISNULL(ORD.NEXT_COUNT, '') AS NEXT_COUNT , ISNULL(ORD.NEXT_VOL_QTY, '') AS NEXT_VOL_QTY , ISNULL(ORD.NEXT_T_WT, '') AS NEXT_T_WT FROM (SELECT HEAD_CD, READ_CD, CODE_NM, CODE_EN, PRIORITY FROM BC_COMM_L) COMM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.PRE_STATUS, A.PRE_COUNT, A.PRE_VOL_QTY, A.PRE_T_WT, B.NEXT_COUNT, B.NEXT_VOL_QTY, B.NEXT_T_WT FROM ( SELECT DELI_BLOCK_CD AS PRE_STATUS , dbo.SetQty(COUNT(1)) AS PRE_COUNT, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(VOL_QTY)), ' ', VOL_UNIT) AS PRE_VOL_QTY, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(T_WT)), ' ', T_WT_UNIT) AS PRE_T_WT FROM SD_ORDER_H WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),DATEADD(M,-1,GETDATE()),120) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),DATEADD(M,0,PO_DT),120) AND DELI_BLOCK_CD IS NOT NULL AND DELI_BLOCK_CD != '' AND VOL_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND T_WT_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND VOL_UNIT != '' AND T_WT_UNIT != '' AND STATUS = 'A' AND DOC_GR = 'SO' AND VOL_UNIT !='MMQ' AND T_WT_UNIT !='MMQ' GROUP BY DELI_BLOCK_CD, VOL_UNIT, T_WT_UNIT ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DELI_BLOCK_CD AS NEXT_STATUS , dbo.SetQty(COUNT(1)) AS NEXT_COUNT, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(VOL_QTY)), ' ', VOL_UNIT) AS NEXT_VOL_QTY, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(T_WT)), ' ', T_WT_UNIT) AS NEXT_T_WT FROM SD_ORDER_H WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),GETDATE(),120) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),DATEADD(M,0,PO_DT),120) AND DELI_BLOCK_CD IS NOT NULL AND DELI_BLOCK_CD != '' AND VOL_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND T_WT_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND VOL_UNIT != '' AND T_WT_UNIT != '' AND STATUS = 'A' AND DOC_GR = 'SO' AND VOL_UNIT !='MMQ' AND T_WT_UNIT !='MMQ' GROUP BY DELI_BLOCK_CD, VOL_UNIT, T_WT_UNIT ) B ON A.PRE_STATUS = B.NEXT_STATUS) ORD ON COMM.READ_CD = ORD.PRE_STATUS WHERE 1 = 1 AND COMM.HEAD_CD ='106200' ORDER BY COMM.PRIORITY

/* Main.xml -> selectSalesOrderStatus */ SELECT CASE WHEN #{LANG} = 'DE' THEN COMM.CODE_NM ELSE COMM.CODE_EN END AS STATUS_NM , ISNULL(ORD.PRE_COUNT, '') AS PRE_COUNT , ISNULL(ORD.PRE_VOL_QTY, '') AS PRE_VOL_QTY , ISNULL(ORD.PRE_T_WT, '') AS PRE_T_WT , ISNULL(ORD.NEXT_COUNT, '') AS NEXT_COUNT , ISNULL(ORD.NEXT_VOL_QTY, '') AS NEXT_VOL_QTY , ISNULL(ORD.NEXT_T_WT, '') AS NEXT_T_WT FROM (SELECT HEAD_CD, READ_CD, CODE_NM, CODE_EN, PRIORITY FROM BC_COMM_L) COMM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.PRE_STATUS, A.PRE_COUNT, A.PRE_VOL_QTY, A.PRE_T_WT, B.NEXT_COUNT, B.NEXT_VOL_QTY, B.NEXT_T_WT FROM ( SELECT QT_STS_CD AS PRE_STATUS , dbo.SetQty(COUNT(1)) AS PRE_COUNT, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(VOL_QTY)), ' ', VOL_UNIT) AS PRE_VOL_QTY, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(T_WT)), ' ', T_WT_UNIT) AS PRE_T_WT FROM SD_ORDER_H WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),DATEADD(M,-1,GETDATE()),120) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),DATEADD(M,0,REQ_DELI_DT),120) AND QT_STS_CD IS NOT NULL AND QT_STS_CD != '' AND VOL_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND T_WT_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND VOL_UNIT != '' AND T_WT_UNIT != '' AND STATUS = 'A' AND DOC_GR = 'QT' AND VOL_UNIT !='MMQ' AND T_WT_UNIT !='MMQ' GROUP BY QT_STS_CD, VOL_UNIT, T_WT_UNIT ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT QT_STS_CD AS NEXT_STATUS , dbo.SetQty(COUNT(1)) AS NEXT_COUNT, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(VOL_QTY)), ' ', VOL_UNIT) AS NEXT_VOL_QTY, CONCAT(dbo.SetAmt(SUM(T_WT)), ' ', T_WT_UNIT) AS NEXT_T_WT FROM SD_ORDER_H WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),GETDATE(),120) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),DATEADD(M,0,REQ_DELI_DT),120) AND QT_STS_CD IS NOT NULL AND QT_STS_CD != '' AND VOL_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND T_WT_UNIT IS NOT NULL AND VOL_UNIT != '' AND T_WT_UNIT != '' AND STATUS = 'A' AND DOC_GR = 'QT' AND VOL_UNIT !='MMQ' AND T_WT_UNIT !='MMQ' GROUP BY QT_STS_CD, VOL_UNIT, T_WT_UNIT ) B ON A.PRE_STATUS = B.NEXT_STATUS) ORD ON COMM.READ_CD = ORD.PRE_STATUS WHERE 1 = 1 AND COMM.HEAD_CD ='110900' ORDER BY COMM.PRIORITY
